website_summaries.verdict: The Throw Pro aims to deliver optimal performance for both top spin-technique throwers and glide throwers. This track shoe from Asics is commended by athletes for improving their performance and even helping them break their personal best records. The shoe not being available in wide width sizing is just a minor drawback that most wearers are willing to look past. The Asics Throw Pro, in general, is a reliable performance shoe that any athlete in the sport of shot put, discus, and hammer throw would definitely look into adding into their shoe arsenal.
pros: Majority of Asics Throw Pro users like the shoes' solidly built quality
The shoe fits as expected according to many wearers
Several users agree that the Throw Pro is very comfortable in the midsole area
Most users also praise the shoe's durability as it lasted through their competition season with no problem at all
Some users appreciate the shoes' overall versatility when used for all types of throwing events
The Throw Pro's outsole is noted by many users to have an excellent grip in the ring
Quite a few wearers are impressed with how reliable and well worth the money this track shoe is
cons: A number of users would like the Asics Throw Pro more if the shoe would be available in wide width sizing
One user says that the initial assessment of the shoe's upper is that it feels a bit stiff

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these throwing track shoes for my daughter. The color is vibrant and the sneakers look exactly like the picture. They fit perfectly and they are very comfortable. IN order to right this review, I put them on and like them as well. Just as my daughter reported, they are very comfortable.She is so excited and is love with these sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Heaven

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My son would wear a size 11 Wide, but with none available in Wide, we ordered these in size 12. They fit well enough, look sharp, and were durable enough for a season of throwing shot and discus on a high school varsity team.
customer_reviews.author: James Shultz

customer_reviews.title: Be careful to the reviews
customer_reviews.text: I'm a discus thrower, I use to wear these shoes before but they weren't the good size. They were 11 and my size is 10.5. I have read a review before to buy and the customer has suggested to buy half point over the size usually used for a better feeling. So, unfortunately, this information was not good for me and that is why I bought a new ones with the right size. They were very good but now they are more than that..
customer_reviews.author: Lussier Jean

customer_reviews.title: Shoe Seems to Run About a Half Size Small
customer_reviews.text: I had first ordered a size 11.5, which is my normal shoe size. I found that is was too short, so I ordered a size 12. It's basically OK, and I'm hoping that it will stretch a little in width with wear. We'll see. My main complaint is that the shoe (a medium) is a bit too narrow for a comfortable initial fit. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Elcajon

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My son throws shot put so these were a great choice for him, Fit well and great price and product
customer_reviews.author: scb

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these. Very comfortable and total true to size. Women go down an entire size and a half to 2 sizes. My daughter has big and wide feet and wears a 9.5-10 in woman's and got a perfect fit 8 in these throwing shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great quality big difference over the other throwing shoes a must buy if your serious about the sport
customer_reviews.author: michael l.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We are wearing them for our tai chi class. I have a wide foot so I bought a half size larger. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: ladonna

customer_reviews.title: This is a great throwing shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and durability, along with its versitility for all throwing events. I am training to compete in the Senior Olympics.
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected my daughter loves them she says they have the perfect bottoms to spin and let discus loose.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Perry

customer_reviews.title: Parents dream
customer_reviews.text: Durable. Lasted through school track season plus AAU track season. So far so good. Tough shoes
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: ASICS shoes are true to their size. It does ...
customer_reviews.text: ASICS shoes are true to their size. It does not make a difference in the shoe style or purpose, the size is consistent
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Love the Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the Shoe, but needed to return for a bigger size.. Runs 1/2 to 1 full size smaller. and not really made for wide feet. But we are waiting for the replacement ones now.. Our Track Star is super pumped about them!
customer_reviews.author: s. henderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter does all the throwing events at school and needed a throwing shoe... found this, must confess I was a lot worried about buying without her fitting it but the shoe is a keeper.. she's happy with her throwing shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline's

customer_reviews.title: Good throwing shoe fits as expected.
customer_reviews.text: No arch support but fits well for size and is of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Cheevers

customer_reviews.title: He is still getting used to them but so far he is satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: My son likes these shoes a lot: although, his coach told him that they are more for shot put gliding than for discus throwing. He is still getting used to them but so far he is satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Please do not substitute size.
customer_reviews.text: The size was faf far smaller than advertized , size 5 instead of size 8.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A Costello

customer_reviews.title: so good. Uppers are very stiff
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Uppers are very stiff, but I "believe" they will loosen up with use. Great grip in the ring.
customer_reviews.author: Wedgewood

customer_reviews.title: These fit perfect on him and was just what we were looking ...
customer_reviews.text: My son has a wide foot and it is always hard to find a pair of throwing shoes that are not to narrow. These fit perfect on him and was just what we were looking for the to do the glide through in!
customer_reviews.author: Rosalind Branch-Muhammad

customer_reviews.title: Way too narrow - usually discus throwers are large and ...
customer_reviews.text: Way too narrow - usually discus throwers are large and have big feet - why don't they make the shoes in wide width? So frustrating ...
customer_reviews.author: Lovespicy

customer_reviews.title: SHOE RUNS ONE SIZE TOO LARGE
customer_reviews.text: Great throwing shoes with tons of grip but still a very good amount of speed to it. The shoe ran a size large so I had to return my size 14, which I wear in everything else, for a 13.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron L.

customer_reviews.title: This was our 3rd try and so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Purchases for daughter. We struggled getting our size and it was impossible to find womens. This was our 3rd try and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were for my son and he is happy with them, so that's all I can say.
customer_reviews.author: Danno

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good shoe. Disappointing part was that I could not buy them in New Zealand.
customer_reviews.author: kiwiguy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Those are the best throw shoes ever I broke my personal best with those shoes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needed a more flatter sole like the cyber throw shoe
customer_reviews.text: Edges too rounded. Needed a more flatter sole like the cyber throw shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and quality. Reliable and well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Frank C Mai

customer_reviews.title: I am a throws Coach at a Division I school ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a throws Coach at a Division I school and my thrower loves this shoe. She is a shot put thrower (glider) weight and hammer thrower and discus which means a lot of rotation. We just received this shoe and she is the first to try the Throw Pro so we will see how it will hold up with a very high volume of rotation.
customer_reviews.author: Bow hunter

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes for shotput and discus!
customer_reviews.text: My stepdaughter bought these shoes for track, and they are great! I hunted all over the place locally for a simple pair of throwing shoes so my stepdaughter could wear them while doing shotput and discus, and let me tell you, it is really annoying that there is hardly a selection of shoes for this part of track and field, and even fewer options are available for young women. So when I landed these shoes on Amazon and for such a great price, I was elated! Even better yet, my stepdaughter says they are comfortable, and she also likes how they look. Win-win situation here!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Johnson

product_meta.title: Asics Unisex-Adult Throw Pro Shoes
product_meta.description: Meet your secret weapon for record breaking throws in the ASICS� Throw� Pro track shoe. Adjustments to the sole geometry and rubber compound make turning on the sole easier.
feature_bullets: Synthetic Leather Upper - Easy to clean.
SpevaFoam Midsole Material - Improves bounce back characteristics and decreases midsole breakdown.
RhynoSkin Synthetic Leather - An abrasion and tear resistant synthetic leather for increased upper durability.
